lines.text: Just an old pile of trash, it seems oddly relatable.
You can't go there anymore. Your landlord kicked you out two weeks ago.
Oh hi there ! I didn't expect to see anyone here.
I used to be the gravedigger around here, but since I died no one's taking care of the graveyard anymore.
No one's coming here anyway, but I wish I had more time to say goodbye to the skeletons...
...They're some of the coolest people I've ever met *wink*
Oh okay bye !
Huh ? Thank you, bud. It won't bring me back to life but it is a nice clock.

success.text: Its constant ticking kind of brought a bit of life back in this garden...Thanks again for the clock.

lines.text: No fish. No fish. I'm not looking for fish, I'm looking for something more personal.
I feel like I can see them on this lake.
Maybe it is just me here, it's always been me right ?.
I try to find them everyday but I really can't seem to get them.
Not the fish. I mean, I don't know, maybe ? Maybe it was the fish all along.
It just won't stop…
If fish can talk, how can you prove you're not one ?
Yes, yes, this will do just fine.

success.text: They threw the tongue in the lake. Fish gathered around to nibble on it.

failure.text: One day I'll be like them.

lines.text: Hey, nice to see you ! It's been a while, I haven't seen you since the “landlord incident”.
Talking about that I found a way to get your house back. Are you down to do a “kind of silly prank” ?
Okay, no problem. I'm here if you need me.
I heard that your landlord is in town right now. He's sleeping at this fancy hotel.
The plan is : you give me your jar of fuel, that way I can set up the boat by the lake.
Meanwhile, you get to the hotel, you pick up the landlord WITHOUT WAKING HIM UP.
And then you meet me by the boat for the rest of the plan. Deal ?
Okay, no problem. I'm here if you need me.
Okay let's go ! I'm going to repair the boat. The landlord is in room 450.
Talk to the receptionist, they're the only one who can open the room for you. Good luck !

success.text: I'll meet you at the lake to complete the plan.

lines.text: Are you god ? Or my mom ? I can't really tell, it's so dark in here.
I've been lost in this cave for as long as I can remember.
It's comfy tho, I like the humidity and the quietness.
I just wished I could see something.
Would you mind not telling people I'm here ? I kind of like being alone
Thank you so much! I can actually see your face now !
And wow, you're kind of slaying that whole “bunch of stuff” look.

success.text: The shadows cast by the lantern remind me of humans, I don't know why.

lines.text: Hello there ! How are you doing on this fine sunny day ?
It's bananas how everything seems to be just right. Everyone is happy here don't you think ?
May your day be full of adventures !
OH MY ! THIS DAY KEEPS GETTING BETTER !
There's a hole there, you can see a bright light coming out of it.
Unfortunately, you're way too big to crawl inside.
Hey, I'm new in town and I'm kind of lost.
Do you know if there's any cool activities to do around here ?
I heard this place sucks but I'm stuck here for my job so…
Oh, I'll see you around I guess.
Thank you ! I'm sure this will be useful.
